io.grpc

Interface Codec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Compressor, Decompressor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Codec.Gzip, Codec.Identity

    @ExperimentalApi(value="https://github.com/grpc/grpc-java/issues/1704")
public interface Codec
extends Compressor, Decompressor
    Encloses classes related to the compression and decompression of messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Codec.Gzip
      A gzip compressor and decompressor.
      static class  Codec.Identity
      The "identity", or "none" codec.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.grpc.Compressor

        compress, getMessageEncoding

      • Methods inherited from interface io.grpc.Decompressor

        decompress, getMessageEncoding
